BILLING_EVENTS.business_description: Contains billing events and transactions for users

columns.name: EVENT_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each billing event

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.business_description: Identifier linking to the user who generated the billing event

columns.name: EVENT_TYPE
columns.business_description: Type of billing event (e.g., subscription, usage, refund)

columns.name: AMOUNT
columns.business_description: Monetary amount associated with the billing event

columns.name: EVENT_DATE
columns.business_description: Date when the billing event occurred

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was first loaded into the system

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system from which the data originated

FEATURE_USAGE.business_description: Tracks usage of various Zoom features during meetings

columns.name: USAGE_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each feature usage record

columns.name: MEETING_ID
columns.business_description: Identifier linking to the meeting where feature was used

columns.name: FEATURE_NAME
columns.business_description: Name of the Zoom feature that was used

columns.name: USAGE_COUNT
columns.business_description: Number of times the feature was used in the meeting

columns.name: USAGE_DATE
columns.business_description: Date when the feature usage occurred

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was first loaded into the system

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system from which the data originated

LICENSES.business_description: Contains information about Zoom licenses and their assignments

columns.name: LICENSE_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each license

columns.name: LICENSE_TYPE
columns.business_description: Type of Zoom license (Basic, Pro, Business, Enterprise)

columns.name: ASSIGNED_TO_USER_ID
columns.business_description: User ID to whom the license is assigned

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.business_description: Date when the license becomes active

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.business_description: Date when the license expires

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was first loaded into the system

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system from which the data originated

MEETINGS.business_description: Contains information about Zoom meetings and their details

columns.name: MEETING_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each meeting

columns.name: HOST_ID
columns.business_description: User ID of the meeting host

columns.name: MEETING_TOPIC
columns.business_description: Topic or title of the meeting

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the meeting started

columns.name: END_TIME
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the meeting ended

columns.name: DURATION_MINUTES
columns.business_description: Duration of the meeting in minutes

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was first loaded into the system

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system from which the data originated

PARTICIPANTS.business_description: Contains information about meeting participants and their attendance

columns.name: PARTICIPANT_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each participant record

columns.name: MEETING_ID
columns.business_description: Identifier linking to the meeting the participant attended

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.business_description: Identifier of the user who participated in the meeting

columns.name: JOIN_TIME
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the participant joined the meeting

columns.name: LEAVE_TIME
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the participant left the meeting

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was first loaded into the system

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system from which the data originated

SUPPORT_TICKETS.business_description: Contains information about customer support tickets and their resolution status

columns.name: TICKET_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each support ticket

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.business_description: Identifier of the user who created the support ticket

columns.name: TICKET_TYPE
columns.business_description: Category or type of the support ticket

columns.name: RESOLUTION_STATUS
columns.business_description: Current status of the ticket resolution

columns.name: OPEN_DATE
columns.business_description: Date when the support ticket was opened

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was first loaded into the system

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system from which the data originated

USERS.business_description: Contains information about Zoom users and their account details

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each user account

columns.name: USER_NAME
columns.business_description: Display name of the user

columns.name: EMAIL
columns.business_description: Email address of the user

columns.name: COMPANY
columns.business_description: Company or organization the user belongs to

columns.name: PLAN_TYPE
columns.business_description: Type of Zoom plan the user is subscribed to

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was first loaded into the system

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system from which the data originated

summary.data_governance_notes: All tables include standard audit columns (LOAD_TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_TIMESTAMP, SOURCE_SYSTEM) for data lineage and tracking. Primary keys are defined for each table to ensure data integrity.
